thread.title: JB in SC
thread.title_full: Auto Europe US reviewed by JB in SC

author: JB in SC
title: JB in SC
text:
From the ease of booking while still at home, to the quality of service while on the road, Auto Europe really delivers.
I like knowing precisely what my rental will cost, and Auto Europe helps me do that. I also like having Auto Europe on my side during the rental and and after it is over. The few times trouble has arisen when a bill was wrong, Auto Europe helped to correct the supplier's problem. The one time my family had some real trouble with a European car rental during a trip, the staff at Auto Europe did their very best to try and help.
Thanks for your help in the past, Auto Europe ... and for many trips to come.
